scripts.release:patch: export $(xargs < .env) && npx lerna version patch --conventional-commits --create-release github --force-publish packages=app-1 --yes
scripts.release:minor: export $(xargs < .env) && npx lerna version minor --conventional-commits --create-release github --yes
scripts.release:major: export $(xargs < .env) && npx lerna version major --conventional-commits --create-release github --yes
